entity.name: Modern Family
entity.description:
A diverse clan bridges cultural and generational gaps.

Photo via @ModernFam

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Modern Family
entity.description: Told from the perspective of an unseen documentary filmmaker, the series offers an honest and often hilarious perspective of family life. Parents Phil and Claire yearn for an honest, open relationship with their three kids. But a teen who is trying to grow up too fast, another who is too smart for her own good, and a rambunctious young son make it challenging. Jay and his much-younger wife are raising her son together, but people sometimes mistake Jay for his wife's father. Meanwhile, partners Mitchell and Cameron have just adopted a child from Vietnam, which poses a different set of challenges.

Today is #AllSaintsDay. Although a Catholic ceremony, the different celebrations are influenced by the indigenous peoples of each area. https://t.co/VIc8JwGBwZ
#Halloween is here! It is celebrated differently around the world. What is the best costume you have ever worn or seen? https://t.co/DQQVt0esqG
Hike, trek, and leave with pictures ready for your next computer wallpaper. Meet the Cordillera Blanca in #Peru. https://t.co/HzCFCxTunP https://t.co/3nohTfJRra
Chicama in #Peru has the longest wave in the world, reaching more than a mile. Moments of bliss lasts much longer 🏄 https://t.co/GN84VvlRby https://t.co/e10BAcD47T

data.text: Do you love Stand up Paddling? Don't miss season 5 of #FacingWaves on Sportskool in South America. @GoPaddle 👉  https://t.co/f34FAD5OM0
